name: 霍弘毅
objective:
Dr. Wall
155770 Research Methods
Thursdays, Period 6-7

Description: In this course we will develop skill in summary, paraphrase and direct quotation, and we will develop techniques for developing a thesis, how to critically evaluate and apply source material, and review the basic focus of the Master’s Essay around Topic, Research Question(s), and Thesis defense.  

Readings: 　　Handouts

Grading: 
MLA Style Mid-term paper (5-6 pgs. + WC) 40%  
MLA Style Final Paper (10-12 pgs. + WC) 60%
